RelatedSentence: KUWAIT : The Ministry of Education is studying proposals from five Arab speaking private schools to improve their status and thus increase their tuitions starting from the next academic year .

The ministry wants to make sure that said schools meet the standards to be upgraded from Category B to Category A ; standards that are related to the student density , buildings and teachers , said Dr Tariq Al - Shatti , the Assistant Undersecretary for Private Education .
